casebody.data:
Shrenik B. BAVISHI, Plaintiff-Movant,
v.
Sam ALADABBAGH d/b/a Diamond Inn, Defendant. M-624/M-684 September Term 2017
080431 Supreme Court of New Jersey. January 26, 2018

ORDER

It is ORDERED that the motion for leave to file a notice of petition for certification as within time (M-624) is granted; and it is further

ORDERED that the motion for leave to supplement the record (M-684) is denied.
